Step 1: Turn on something on your home pc that lets you find out every port someone is hitting; I did it with the router, but that's tricky.. some sort of honeypot would work

Step 3: Go home, collect the logs - see what came through
Step 4: Set up the ssh server on that port, and make sure you set it to allow tunnelling (check the ubuntuforums or wiki)
Step 5: Use Putty from work to ssh tunnel through your home connection :)
